json.text: Sylvanas Windrunner the Dark Lady Queen of the Forsaken former Ranger general
of Silvermoon here are 10 facts you didn't know about her. Number ten she comes from the
High Elf Windrunner family and has two sisters an older sister Alleria and a
younger sister Vereesa and two brothers Lyroth and Sylvos. Number nine when
Arthas and the Scourge came to Quel'Thanas to take the power of the Sunwell
Sylvanas was there to defend her homeland her superb archery skills and
tactical abilities foiled the plans of the Scourge for a long time in an
attack retreat battle however in the end Arthas was able to succeed and
cut her down. He severed her soul from her mortal body as an act of revenge
turning her into the first high elf Banshee. he also locked her body away in
an iron coffin to torment her even more
she unwillingly served and aided him in the destruction of Silvermoon number
eight later on as Arthas's powers were beginning to diminish Sylvanas
gained back her free will she tentatively aligned with the dreadlords who we're
looking to overthrow him and plotted an assassination plan she had managed
to reposess her own body and has became a corporal undead she hit Arthas with a poison
arrow that paralyzed him however Kel Thuzad managed to stop her from
capturing and torturing the Lich King forcing Sylvanas to flee instead.
Number seven - she knew it was only a matter of time before the dread Lords were going
to dispose of her and with minimal forces she decided to form an army and
take over Lordaeron. She sent out her banshees to posess the leader of the local
ogres the Bandit Lord Blacktorne, the Gnoll ruler Snarlmane and the Murloc Puddle Lord
which mirrors her Hearthstone card interaction of possessing the opponents
minions when she dies which is a Banshee ability. Number six she bent the
dreadlord Varimathras to her will and with the help of the human remnants
led by Lord garthas killed Balazar and Detheroc. With the death of both dreadlords
Garathos and disbanding of the human remnants Sylvanas was able to claim
Lordaeron. She made her home under the former capital city which she named the Undercity
Number five - even though Sylvanas is part of the Horde she's not what you'd call a
team player she has always put the interest of the Forsaken above the
interests of the Horde which has made the Horde leaders suspicious and wary
around her wanting to care for her people she uses the powers of necromancy
with the help of the Val'Kyr
the ascended Vrykul women who once served the Lich King to raise more of the
Forsaken from the dead as she's concerned they cannot procreate on their own
she's known to always having her own agenda number four the Valkyr are her own
personal secret weapon as proud as she is from the mere fact that she managed
to claim the spirits who used to serve her enemy the Lich King she found out
that they are able to raise her body from the dead when she was killed by
Godfrey after defeating the Gilneas liberation front in Silverpine forest
the Valkyr Agatha, Arthura and Dashla sacrifice themselves and
give Sylvanas life once more. this convinces Sylvanas beyond a shadow of a
doubt the Valkyr are the future of the Forsaken number free her younger sister
Vareesa lovingly referred to by Sylvanas as little moon entertained the
idea of joining her sister in leadership of the Forsaken despite the fact that it
would require her to abandon her children Sylvanas realised that the Forsaken would not
accept a living creature into their ranks and she wanted to murder Vereesa to
raise her as an undead they had a plan together to poison Garrosh Hellscream
however at the last moment Vereesa relented and informed Anduin of the
poison in Hellscream's food after learning of the plan's failure the Banshee
Queen rampaged through the wilderness angrily killing any wildlife unfortunate
enough to get in her way and proclaimed that she would never attempt to love
again and number two an epic ring called band of the Ranger general is found in the
remains of Kaelthas Sunstrider after we defeat him in the eye of the Tempest Keep
the description of the ring clearly states that it was formerly worn by
Sylvanas Kaelthas is implied to have had a fairly poor relationship with
Sylvanas Windrunner who was not above defying his orders back when they
served together Sylvanas herself upon finding a medallion with Kaelthas's image
on the beach of Quaelthas picks it up and throws it into the sea
she resents Kaelthas for not participating in the battle of Silvermoon
where she was killed as he was in Dalaran chasing after Jaina Proudmoore in a
romantic attempt at number one
a remnant of Sylvanas's happy life before the war can be found in Dalaran
in one of the fountains you can find Sylvanas Windrunners gold coin which
reads once owned by Sylvanas when you pick it up
reminding us that before becoming the queen of the undead she travelled laughed
and had a happy life with wishes hopes and dreams everything taken away from
her by the Lich King. That is one dark story guys but a good one but a quick update
the resource of nasa sister and out with running and co-authors good rejected
budget a problem because she was in love with Arthur's so-called for us when
we've done a little was the only guy available at this time but on the other
notes we want to have for the next episode 1 have some dragons let us know
which I'm sure we pick blogs deafening Alex Rosenhaus normal there is no we
reading the comments then we are enjoying a few bucks off thank you so
much for giving us the feedback subscribe to the show if you missed the
previous episodes check of the branch librarian we are linking to violent
right here on some side of this video
thank you again and see you guys next episode
